text: Luther Ronzoni Vandross Jr. (April 20, 1951 – July 1, 2005) was an American R&B;/soul singer-songwriter. He sold over 25 million albums and won eight Grammy Awards during his singing career. Vandross died of a heart attack on July 1, 2005. title: Luther Vandross
